channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump orders review of all green card holders from countries "of concern" after D.C. attack
item.description: President Trump has ordered "a full scale, rigorous reexamination of every Green Card" holder from "every country of concern," U.S. Citizenship and Im...

item.title: Robotaxis are spreading across the U.S.
item.description: Data: Axios research; Note: Current and future robotaxi providers include Waymo, Uber, Lyft and Zoox, among others; Map: Kavya Beheraj/Axios Hailing a...

item.title: D.C. shooting suspect faces first-degree murder charge after Guard member dies
item.description: The suspect accused of shooting two National Guard members just blocks from the White House now faces a first-degree murder charge after one of the vi...

item.title: Social media users flee X, flock to TikTok and Reddit
item.description: Data: Pew Research Center; Note: Survey was conducted by phone only in 2021, and by web, mail and phone in 2025; Chart: Kavya Beheraj/Axios Americans'...

item.title: Trump says he'll "permanently pause migration from all Third World Countries"
item.description: President Trump said late Thursday he "will permanently pause migration from all Third World Countries to allow the U.S. system to fully recover." The...

item.title: Retired judges warn that the rule of law is unraveling
item.description: In interviews, former state and federal judges describe the consequences when the rule of law begins to falter, warning that democracy’s guardrails ma...

item.title: New Mar-a-Lago no-fly zone means endless plane noise for neighbors
item.description: Flight rules altered in October by the Secret Service route planes over the Palm Beach homes of millionaires and billionaires, even when President Don...

item.title: Charges against suspect upgraded as Trump vows immigration policy changes
item.description: The National Guard shooting suspect now faces a charge of murder in the first degree, following the death of Spec. Sarah Beckstrom.

item.title: Trump’s flexible diplomacy drives new Ukraine peace push — and fresh turmoil
item.description: The president’s improvisatory approach is unsettling Kyiv and its allies. Backers say Trump’s style might win results where others have failed.

item.title: The facts you need to win political arguments with your family
item.description: When the turkey comes with a side of hot topics to discuss, here are the facts you need to know.

item.title: Trump, stung by Republican losses, stands his ground on affordability
item.description: Democrats running on cost-of-living anxieties outperformed Republicans in Tuesday’s elections by greater-than-expected margins. The president chalked ...

item.title: Voters on Tuesday rewarded Democrats who addressed economic costs. Hours later, Trump said he delivered an 'economic miracle.'
item.description: A recent poll found a majority of Americans feel they’re spending more on groceries than they did a year ago.

item.title: Reaganomics in Jersey: Jack Ciattarelli has a supply-side dream if he’s elected governor this week
item.description: The Republican nominee has promised tax cuts and economic growth, but the numbers are fuzzy.

item.title: Trump's approval holds steady despite unpopular policies, per new NYT poll
item.description: Trump’s strength with Republicans on the economy could prove to be a boon for the GOP.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
